description.en: Ratatouille - a classic europe dish.
description.zh: Ratatouille - a classic europe dish.
description.sv: Ratatouille - a classic europe dish.

en: 300 g vegetables
15 ml olive oil
2 cloves garlic
zh: 300 g vegetables
15 ml 橄榄油
2 cloves 大蒜
sv: 300 g vegetables
15 ml olivolja
2 cloves vitlök

en: Prepare the main ingredients: vegetables, olive oil, garlic.
Season or marinate as needed for flavor.
Preheat the oven or pan to the required temperature.
Cook using appropriate method (grill, sauté, bake, or simmer) until done.
Adjust seasoning and serve hot with preferred sides.
